summary.span: 命名空间提供一些类，这些类在基于 Windows 的应用程序中支持访问 Microsoft Ajax 身份验证、角色和配置文件服务。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that support access in Windows-based applications to the Microsoft Ajax authentication, roles, and profiles services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的类命名空间支持中的客户端应用程序服务提供程序命名空间。The classes in the namespace support the client application service providers in the namespace. 这些服务提供程序使基于 Windows 的应用程序能够使用[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)]身份验证、 角色和配置文件服务通过现有[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]成员身份、 标识和应用程序设置基础结构。These service providers enable Windows-based applications to use the [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] authentication, roles, and profiles services through existing [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] membership, identity, and application settings infrastructures. 客户端服务提供程序还支持偶尔连接的存储和检索本地数据缓存中的用户信息时应用程序处于脱机状态。The client service providers also support occasional connectivity by storing and retrieving user information in a local data cache when the application is offline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md). 和类提供属性和方法与用户的标识、 角色和身份验证状态相关。The and classes provide properties and methods related to a user's identity, role, and authentication state. 类使您能够在本地数据缓存中存储用户的网络连接的状态。The class enables you to store the status of the user's network connection in the local data cache. 连接状态指示客户端服务提供程序将使用脱机缓存还是尝试访问应用程序服务。The connectivity status indicates whether the client service providers will use the offline cache or attempt to access the application services. > [!NOTE] > 类不包含任何逻辑来确定网络连接的实际状态。The class contains no logic to determine the actual status of the network connection. 您负责确定你根据自己的条件和设置的应用程序的连接状态属性相应地。You are responsible for determining the connectivity status of your application according to your own criteria and setting the property accordingly. 例如，基于 Windows 的应用程序通常提供用户界面中的一个选项，以便用户可以在脱机模式下工作，或尝试进入联机状态。For example, Windows-based applications often provide an option in the user interface so that users can work in offline mode or attempt to go online.
